meanings.sent1: The soundproofed room kept all noise out.
meanings.sent2: The soundproofed walls prevented any sound from entering.
meanings.sent3: The soundproofed headphones made it seem like the world was silent.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was like a soundproofed chamber, shielding her from the noise of the world.
meanings.sent5: The soundproofed door was a barrier against the loud music outside.

meanings.sent1: He soundproofed the studio to ensure perfect audio quality.
meanings.sent2: They soundproofed the windows to block out the street noise.
meanings.sent3: She soundproofed the doghouse so the neighbors wouldn't complain about barking.
meanings.sent4: The engineer soundproofed the conference room for confidential meetings.
meanings.sent5: The team soundproofed the walls to keep their discussions private.
